sid
click
@/@item/@window/@items/@_xworker_thingEditorWindow_tree_/@listeners/@click/@setCurrentItem
sname
setCurrentItem
Scode
#$@text#$@
//设置当前选中的树节点
var tree = Ext.getCmp('xworker_thingAddChildWindow_tree');
var id = node.attributes.id;
if(id.indexOf("thing:") == 0){
    id = id.substring(6, id.length);
    var iframe = document.getElementById('xworker_thingAddChildWindow_docmentFrame');
    iframe.src = 'do?sc=xworker.ide.worldExplorer.swt.http.ThingDoc/@desc&thing=' + id;
    tree.currentThingPath = id;
}else{
    var btn = Ext.getCmp('xworker_thingAddChildWindow_editButton');
    btn.setDisabled(true);
    var iframe = document.getElementById('xworker_thingAddChildWindow_docmentFrame');
    iframe.src = 'do?sc=xworker.app.view.extjs.xworker.thingEditor.DocControls/@blank';
    return;
}
#$@text#$@

@/@item/@window/@buttons/@editButton/@handler/@inputName/@OkFunction/@Code
sname
setThingPath
Scode
#$@text#$@
var ext = Ext;
var tree = ext.getCmp('xworker_thingTreeWindow_tree');
var thingPath = tree.currentThingPath;

var descTree = ext.getCmp('xworker_thingAddChildWindow_tree');
var descriptorPath = descTree.currentThingPath;
#$@text#$@

smethod
'POST'
Sparams
#$@text#$@
{
    thingPath: thingPath,
    descriptorPath: descriptorPath,
    name: text
}
#$@text#$@

@/@item/@window/@buttons/@editButton/@handler/@inputName/@OkFunction/@createThingNode/@Success

sdescriptors

sth_registMyChilds
false
sth_mark
false
sid
Success
@/@item/@window/@buttons/@editButton/@handler/@inputName/@OkFunction/@createThingNode/@Success/@initData
sname
initData
Scode
#$@text#$@
var obj = Ext.decode(response.responseText);
var data = obj.data;

var thingTree = ext.getCmp('xworker_thingTreeWindow_tree');

var selectedNode = thingTree.getSelectionModel().getSelectedNode();
if(selectedNode){
    var selectedParentNode = null;
    
    var newNode = new Ext.tree.TreeNode({
        text : data.name,
        icon : data.icon,
        id : data.path,
        dataId : data.path,
        tabId : data.path,
        expandable : false,
        expanded:false,    
        abcd__ : 'do not remove this, it\'s ensure node ok',
        attributes:{
        text : data.name,
        id : data.path,
        dataId : data.path,
        tabId : data.path,
        }
    });
    
    if (selectedParentNode == null) {
        selectedNode.appendChild(newNode);
    } else {
        selectedParentNode.insertBefore(newNode, selectedNode);
    }
}else{
    alert('没有选中的树节点，path=xworker.app.view.extjs.xworker.thingEditor.XWorker_ThingAddChildWindow/@item/@window/@buttons/@editButton/@handler/@inputName/@OkFunction/@createThingNode/@Success/@insertTreeNode');
}
#$@text#$@
